DocumentSummary.Title: Pathogen: environmental/food/other sample from Pectobacterium colocasium

Description.Title: Pathogen: environmental/food/other sample from Pectobacterium colocasium

Comment.Paragraph: Complete genome sequencing of two strains (PL152 and PL155) proposed to belong to Pectobacterium colocasium, were isolated from the diseased taro corms, collected from Hawai'i in 2018. Based on concurrent results of multi-approach analysis including Average Nucleotide Identity (ANI), digital DNA DNA Hybridization (dDDH) and Multi-Locus Sequencing Analysis (MLSA), the strains PL152 and PL155 are supported as a novel species of Pectobacterium genus.
